metadata.title: UAE President informally exchange views with PM, drives vehicle

content.article_body: RAHIM YAR KHAN, Jan 05 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Sunday met with His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, President of the United Arab Emirates here and discussed matters of mutual and bilateral interest. President Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan drove the vehicle and the prime minister accompanied him. In the vehicle, the two leaders exchanged views in an informal and pleasant manner. The prime minister welcomed the UAE president in his second home Pakistan.
content.summary: Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif met with UAE President Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan in Rahim Yar Khan to discuss matters of mutual interest. The UAE President drove the vehicle while the two leaders had an informal discussion. The Prime Minister welcomed the UAE president to Pakistan.
keywords: Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan
